cards.name: Next-Gen Firewall
cards.description: Advanced firewall that uses deep packet inspection and threat intelligence to identify and block malicious traffic.
cards.effect: Blocks the first 100 points of damage from attacks each turn.

cards.name: SIEM Solution
cards.description: Security Information and Event Management system that collects and analyzes security alerts in real-time.
cards.effect: Once per turn, allows viewing one random card in attacker's hand.

cards.name: Intrusion Prevention System
cards.description: Actively monitors network traffic to detect and prevent vulnerability exploits.
cards.effect: When an attack card is played, you can discard this card to negate that attack and deal 50 damage to opponent.

cards.name: Security Patch Management
cards.description: Systematic deployment of security updates to address known vulnerabilities.
cards.effect: Reduces damage from all attacks by 30% for 3 turns.

cards.name: Endpoint Detection & Response
cards.description: Monitors endpoint devices to detect, investigate, and mitigate suspicious activities.
cards.effect: When an attack targets a specific system, prevent that damage and deal 75 damage to the attacker.

cards.name: Honeypot System
cards.description: Decoy system designed to attract attackers and study their techniques.
cards.effect: When attacked, capture the attacking card and add it to your hand. Deal 125 damage to opponent.

cards.name: Security Awareness Training
cards.description: Employee education program to recognize and avoid security threats.
cards.effect: Reduces damage from non-technical attacks by 50% and deals 50 damage to opponent.

cards.name: Multi-Factor Authentication
cards.description: Authentication method requiring multiple verification factors before granting access.
cards.effect: Password-based attacks deal 0 damage. Deal 100 damage when such attacks are played.

cards.name: Network Segmentation
cards.description: Dividing network into isolated subnetworks to limit lateral movement of threats.
cards.effect: Reduces area-of-effect attacks by 60%. Attacker must target specific segments individually.

cards.name: SOAR Platform
cards.description: Security Orchestration, Automation and Response tool that coordinates security operations.
cards.effect: Searches your deck for a countermeasure card and puts it in your hand. Heals 100 System Integrity.

cards.name: Network Traffic Analysis
cards.description: Advanced monitoring of network traffic patterns to detect anomalous activity.
cards.effect: Reduces opponent's stealth points by 150. Deals 75 damage for each reconnaissance card in opponent's graveyard.

cards.name: Behavioral Analytics
cards.description: System that analyzes user behavior to identify deviations that may indicate a security threat.
cards.effect: Reduces opponent's stealth points by 100 for each attack played last turn. Deals 50 damage per attack played last turn.

cards.name: Canary Tokens
cards.description: Strategically placed fake assets that trigger alerts when accessed, revealing attacker presence.
cards.effect: When opponent plays a reconnaissance card, they lose 200 stealth points and take 150 damage.

cards.name: Security Log Monitoring
cards.description: Continuous review of security logs to detect suspicious activities.
cards.effect: Reduces opponent's stealth points by 100. If they have less than 300 stealth points, they take 200 damage.

cards.name: Deception Technology
cards.description: Creates decoys of IT assets to misdirect attackers from genuine assets.
cards.effect: When opponent attacks, they lose 150 stealth points and their attack deals 50% less damage.

cards.name: Threat Hunting Team
cards.description: Proactive security professionals who search for threats that have evaded existing security solutions.
cards.effect: Reduce opponent's stealth by 100 points. Deal 75 damage for every card in opponent's hand.

cards.name: Blue Team Response
cards.description: Dedicated team of security professionals who defend against attacks in real-time.
cards.effect: Immediately end opponent's turn. Restore 100 System Integrity points.

cards.name: Digital Forensics
cards.description: Collection and analysis of digital evidence to understand attack vectors.
cards.effect: Examine opponent's graveyard and remove up to 2 attack cards from it. Deal 125 damage to opponent.

cards.name: Zero Trust Architecture
cards.description: Security model that assumes no user or system is inherently trusted.
cards.effect: All attack cards require 50 more cost to play while this is active. Deals 50 damage when opponent plays an attack.

cards.name: Threat Intelligence Feed
cards.description: Collection of data that provides information about potential or current threats.
cards.effect: Once per turn, look at opponent's hand and choose one card they cannot play next turn. Deal 75 damage.

cards.name: Web Application Firewall
cards.description: Filters and monitors HTTP traffic between web applications and clients.
cards.effect: Blocks web-based attacks. These attacks deal 0 damage and opponent loses 125 stealth points.

cards.name: Secure Email Gateway
cards.description: Email security solution that blocks spam, malware, and phishing attempts.
cards.effect: Prevents phishing attacks from working. Discard any phishing cards played and deal 150 damage to opponent.

cards.name: DDoS Protection
cards.description: Network security technology that protects against distributed denial-of-service attacks.
cards.effect: Nullifies DDoS attack cards and prevents their effects. Deal 200 damage to opponent when they play DDoS.

cards.name: Data Loss Prevention
cards.description: System that detects and prevents data breaches and data exfiltration attempts.
cards.effect: If your System Integrity would drop below 500, prevent 300 points of that damage once per game.

cards.name: Air-Gapped System
cards.description: Computer system physically isolated from unsecured networks to maximize security.
cards.effect: Immune to remote exploits and network-based attacks for 3 turns. Heals 100 System Integrity per turn.

cards.name: Backup & Recovery
cards.description: Protects against data loss and system failures by maintaining copies of important data.
cards.effect: Restore 300 System Integrity points. Can only be used once per game.

cards.name: Security Operations Center
cards.description: Centralized unit for monitoring and addressing security issues on an ongoing basis.
cards.effect: Each turn, reduce incoming damage by 75 and opponent's stealth by 50. Draw an extra card each turn.

cards.name: Penetration Testing Team
cards.description: Security professionals who simulate cyberattacks to identify vulnerabilities before real attackers do.
cards.effect: Immediately reduce opponent's stealth to 0 and deal 250 damage.

cards.name: Incident Response Plan
cards.description: Documented approach to addressing and managing the aftermath of a security breach.
cards.effect: When System Integrity drops below 300, activate to restore 250 points and draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Cyber Insurance
cards.description: Insurance policy that helps organizations recover from cybersecurity incidents.
cards.effect: If your System Integrity would reach 0, instead set it to 200. Remove this card from the game.

cards.name: Metasploit Framework
cards.description: Comprehensive penetration testing tool that identifies and exploits vulnerabilities.
cards.effect: Deal 200 damage. Can bypass basic defense cards.

cards.name: Nmap Scanner
cards.description: Network mapping tool that discovers hosts and services on a network.
cards.effect: Reveal 3 random cards in opponent's hand. Deal 50 damage.

cards.name: Wireshark
cards.description: Network protocol analyzer that captures and inspects data packets.
cards.effect: Look at opponent's hand for one turn. Deal 75 damage if they have more than 3 cards.

cards.name: Burp Suite Pro
cards.description: Web vulnerability scanner and application security testing tool.
cards.effect: Reveal face-down defender cards and deal 175 damage. Bypasses basic Web Application defenses.

cards.name: John the Ripper
cards.description: Password cracking tool that can break through authentication defenses.
cards.effect: Deal 150 damage. If opponent has Multi-Factor Authentication, deal only 50 damage.

cards.name: Hashcat
cards.description: Advanced password recovery utility.
cards.effect: Deal 175 damage. Can bypass basic authentication defenses.

cards.name: Aircrack-ng
cards.description: Network software suite for auditing wireless networks.
cards.effect: Deal 125 damage. If opponent has a wireless network card in play, deal double damage.

cards.name: Hydra
cards.description: Parallelized login cracker that supports numerous protocols.
cards.effect: Deal 150 damage. For each failed attempt, increase damage by 25 on next turn.

cards.name: SQLmap
cards.description: Automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool.
cards.effect: Deal 225 damage to opponent's System Integrity. If they have a 'Database' card in play, deal 75 additional damage.

cards.name: Social Engineering Toolkit
cards.description: Framework for simulating social engineering attacks.
cards.effect: Take one random card from opponent's hand. Deal 150 damage unless they have Security Awareness Training.

cards.name: Kali Linux
cards.description: Security-focused operating system with penetration testing tools.
cards.effect: Boost all attack cards by 50 damage. Provide 100 defense against counter-attacks.

cards.name: Shodan
cards.description: Search engine for internet-connected devices.
cards.effect: Reveal all of opponent's defense cards. Your next attack deals 100 additional damage.

cards.name: Mimikatz
cards.description: Tool for extracting plaintexts, passwords, and hashes from memory.
cards.effect: Steal opponent's authentication cards. Deal 200 damage.

cards.name: OWASP ZAP
cards.description: Web application security scanner for finding vulnerabilities.
cards.effect: Reveal any web application vulnerabilities. Deal 100 damage and increase next attack by 75.

cards.name: Empire Framework
cards.description: Post-exploitation framework for maintaining control of compromised systems.
cards.effect: Deal 100 damage now and 50 damage at the beginning of your next 3 turns.

cards.name: Nikto
cards.description: Web server scanner that performs tests against web servers for multiple vulnerabilities.
cards.effect: Deal 75 damage. Reveal all web server defense cards.

cards.name: BeEF (Browser Exploitation Framework)
cards.description: Penetration testing tool focusing on web browsers.
cards.effect: Deal 125 damage. If target is using a browser, gain control of one of their cards for 1 turn.

cards.name: Responder
cards.description: LLMNR, NBT-NS and MDNS poisoner to capture credentials.
cards.effect: Capture opponent's authentication credentials. Deal 150 damage and reduce their defense by 50.

cards.name: Maltego
cards.description: Open source intelligence and forensics application.
cards.effect: Map opponent's network and relationships. Deal 25 damage and gain 50 defense. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Covert Channel
cards.description: Hidden communication method that violates security policy.
cards.effect: Hide your next attack from detection. Gain 100 defense against Intelligence cards.

cards.name: VPN Tunnel
cards.description: Secure connection that provides encrypted data transmission.
cards.effect: Hide your attack cards from opponent's view until activation. Gain 150 stealth points.

cards.name: Proxychains
cards.description: Tool that forces connections through proxy servers.
cards.effect: Prevent opponent from seeing your card effects. Gain 200 stealth points.

cards.name: Cobalt Strike
cards.description: Threat emulation software for adversary simulations.
cards.effect: Deal 250 damage. Can establish persistent access to target systems.

cards.name: Rainbow Tables
cards.description: Precomputed table for reversing cryptographic hash functions.
cards.effect: Deal 175 damage. Especially effective against basic password hashes.

cards.name: Rubber Ducky
cards.description: USB device that registers as a keyboard to inject keystrokes.
cards.effect: Bypass authentication. Deal 200 damage if opponent has no physical security cards.

cards.name: DNS Poisoning
cards.description: Attack that corrupts Domain Name System data.
cards.effect: Redirect network traffic. Deal 150 damage and prevent opponent from playing defense cards next turn.

cards.name: Rootkit
cards.description: Collection of software designed to enable access to restricted areas of software.
cards.effect: Deal 100 damage per turn until detected. Gain 100 defense against detection tools.

cards.name: DDoS Attack
cards.description: Distributed Denial of Service attack that overwhelms systems with traffic.
cards.effect: Deal 300 damage. If opponent has DDoS Protection, this card has no effect.

cards.name: Phishing Campaign
cards.description: Social engineering attack to steal user data.
cards.effect: Deal 200 damage. If opponent has Security Awareness Training, deal only 50 damage.

cards.name: Zero-Day Exploit
cards.description: Previously unknown vulnerability with no available patches.
cards.effect: Deal 350 damage. Cannot be blocked by common defenses.
